title: Solution1. Receive data by providing industrial IoT solutions
subTitle: Industrial IoT solutions provided by Korea ORBCOMM provide solutions suitable for various industries such as construction equipment monitoring, marine information monitoring, and climate information monitoring.

title: Solution4. Collecting AIS information from all regions worldwide and delivering it to our customers.
subTitle: It is a ship-borne system that transmits crucial data that supports the identification, location, and navigation of vessels, enhancing maritime safety. AIS data is used for maritime domain awareness, search and rescue operations, environmental monitoring, and maritime information analysis.
